title: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, the entire client area is redrawn N times, resulting in inefficient redraws.
OB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, the entire client area is redrawn N times.
EB: The entire client area should not be redrawn multiple times when appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps: 
1. Add the following line to StyledText's performPaint method: 
System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight); 
2. Append N lines to the StyledText in word wrap mode.
3. Observe the number of redraws occurring in the console.
